CutSceneText.Text: Do you speak the language of the Elyos?
Garpi Teriterirash, very clever. Yes, I speak the language of the Elyos.
I'm curious to know about Tursin Orcs.
Exactly. Where is the Leader of the Tursin Orcs?
Gaphyrk, you do not betray your friends.
Hmm... If I do you a favour, will you tell me then?
I have a little brother in the Barat Forge Caverns, Vein of Flame. I haven't seen him for a long time due to my imprisonment.
Sorry, but I can't let you go.
Yes. I'll give it to him once I have completed my mission.
My little brother is called Gaphyrk Pinipinirash.
There are lots of caves around the Orc camp in the Ishalgen Wilderness. The cave in the southeast belongs to Commander Shandu.
I understand. I'll keep my promise.
Thank you so much. You are a good Elyos!
